customHtml.title: A World of Thrill and Luxury
customHtml.description:
Grand Villa Casino Burnaby is more than just a casino; it’s a full-scale entertainment destination combining gaming excitement, fine dining, and luxurious accommodation. From spacious gaming floors to stylish lounges, every detail is designed to create an atmosphere of elegance and energy. Located in the heart of Burnaby, just minutes from Vancouver, it’s the perfect spot for leisure and entertainment.


The gaming experience here is truly impressive: over a thousand modern slot machines, numerous tables for classic games like blackjack, roulette, and baccarat, plus a dedicated poker room for strategic play. High rollers can enjoy exclusive VIP rooms with premium service. Guests can chase jackpots reaching up to millions of dollars, while new players benefit from generous sign-up bonuses.


Dining at Grand Villa Casino is equally exceptional. The complex features a variety of restaurants and bars, from the sophisticated ATLAS Steak + Fish to the vibrant CHOW Lucky Noodle Bar. Stylish bars such as Centro and Alpina Lounge offer cocktails and light bites, while Personas Patio creates a lively atmosphere with music and dancing.


For those wishing to stay overnight or host business events, the connected Delta Burnaby Hotel & Conference Centre provides comfortable rooms and modern meeting spaces, making the venue ideal for both leisure and corporate gatherings. The casino also hosts regular entertainment shows, concerts, and themed nights, ensuring a festive vibe every day.


Loyalty programs add extra value to every visit. The Encore Rewards system allows guests to earn points and redeem them for bonuses, discounts, and exclusive perks. Grand Villa Casino Burnaby is where thrill meets comfort, turning every visit into an unforgettable experience.


Grand Villa Casino Burnaby Visitor Guidelines

Visiting Grand Villa Casino Burnaby requires following certain rules to ensure comfort and safety for all guests. The casino is designed for adults, so the minimum age for entry is 19 years. Guests must present valid photo identification. The venue maintains an elegant atmosphere through its dress code and behavioral standards, creating a pleasant experience for everyone.


Entry Requirements

  • • Valid photo ID is required.
  • • Minimum age for entry is 19.
  • • Alcohol and illegal substances are prohibited.
  • • Responsible gaming policy applies.

Dress Code

  • • Smart casual or elegant attire recommended.
  • • Sportswear, beachwear, and torn clothing are not allowed.
  • • Hats and sunglasses are discouraged in gaming areas.

Behavior Rules

  • • Show respect to staff and other guests.
  • • Photography in gaming zones is restricted.
  • • Smoking is permitted only in designated areas.

Encore Rewards — Grand Villa Casino Burnaby Loyalty Program

Encore Rewards is an exclusive loyalty program designed for regular guests of Grand Villa Casino Burnaby. It offers bonuses for gaming, dining, and event participation, making every visit more rewarding. Membership is free—just sign up at Guest Services with valid photo ID. The more you play and spend, the higher your tier and the greater the benefits.


The program features multiple tiers, each unlocking unique perks and rewards. Members earn points for slot and table play, as well as dining purchases. Points can be redeemed for free play, dining discounts, event tickets, and even hotel packages. Higher tiers bring more privileges, from invitations to private events to personalized gifts and exclusive promotions.


Tiers and Requirements

  • • Single Diamond — entry-level tier upon registration.
  • • Double Diamond — unlocked at about 7,500 points (approx. $7,500 slot play).
  • • Triple Diamond — requires 45,000 points (approx. $45,000 slot play annually).
  • • Elite — reserved for top players.

Program Benefits

  • • Free membership and welcome bonuses.
  • • Discounts on dining and hotel stays.
  • • Birthday bonuses and special promotions.
  • • Access to exclusive events and prize draws.
  • • Earn points not only for gaming but also for dining.

Bonuses

  • • New members receive up to $10 Free Play upon joining.
  • • Monthly promotions with prizes up to $20,000.
  • • Special packages like “Stay & Play” include hotel stay + $10 Free Play + $10 dining credit.
  • • Points can be redeemed for show tickets, contests, and gifts.

Bonuses and Special Offers at Grand Villa Casino Burnaby

Grand Villa Casino Burnaby offers guests not only thrilling games but also a wide range of bonuses, promotions, and seasonal events that make every visit exciting. The casino regularly hosts cash prize draws, free play giveaways, and themed celebrations. Special offers cover gaming, dining, and hotel stays, giving visitors plenty of ways to enjoy extra perks. Throughout the year, major promotions feature prize pools worth hundreds of thousands of dollars, along with unique deals for poker and table game enthusiasts.


Bonuses and Events

  • • Grand Villa Luxe Nights — prize pool of $200,000, including up to $20,000 cash in select draws (November).
  • • Snow Me the Money — winter promotion with over $1,000,000 in prizes, weekly draws up to $5,000 cash (November–January).
  • • Happy 17th Villa-Versary — celebration offer with $5 Free Play for social media participation (November).
  • • Elite Spins Reloaded — weekly high-stakes draws with prize pools up to $3,000 (Fridays).
  • • Rising Rewards — progressive draws with prizes up to $20,000 in a single evening (September–November).
  • • ATLAS Gift Card Offer — $20 bonus with every $100 gift card purchase at ATLAS Steak + Fish (until December).
  • • Encore Reward Sunday Night Special — “Stay & Play” package with hotel stay + $10 Free Play + $10 dining credit.
  • • Games Night at Personas — free-to-play games with prize chances and drink discounts (every Monday).

Popular Games at Grand Villa Casino Burnaby

Grand Villa Casino Burnaby offers a wide range of games designed to satisfy both beginners and seasoned players. The gaming experience is centered around modern slot machines featuring diverse themes and progressive jackpots. Fans of classic casino games can enjoy blackjack, roulette, and baccarat tables, along with exclusive poker variations. For those seeking innovation and excitement, the Pulse Arena provides electronic tables and interactive features. The casino also hosts poker tournaments and special gaming promotions, creating an atmosphere of thrill and competition. With such variety, every visit promises a unique and engaging experience.


Popular Games

  • • Slot Machines — hundreds of slots with bonus rounds and progressive jackpots.
  • • Blackjack — classic card game with high-stakes options.
  • • Roulette — European and American versions for luck seekers.
  • • Baccarat — elegant game for strategy enthusiasts.
  • • Poker — Texas Hold’em, Pai Gow, and tournaments with big prizes.
  • • Pulse Arena — electronic tables with dynamic gameplay.

Entertainment and Shows at Grand Villa Casino Burnaby

Grand Villa Casino Burnaby is more than just a gaming destination—it’s a vibrant entertainment hub where every night feels like a celebration. Guests can enjoy live music, themed parties, and performances by top DJs, creating an unforgettable nightlife experience. Regular shows and concerts bring energy to the venue, while stylish bars and lounges transform into dance floors and social spaces. Personas Patio Restaurant + Lounge serves as the heart of nightlife with its dance floor, big screens, and lively atmosphere.


Weekly events include live band performances, DJ sets, and themed nights such as “Retro 80s Night.” ATLAS Steak + Fish hosts live entertainment every Saturday and guest DJs every Friday, adding a sophisticated twist to the evening. Personas Lounge offers trivia nights, sports broadcasts, and dance parties, making it a versatile spot for fun. Seasonal celebrations like New Year’s Eve parties and holiday specials add even more excitement to the calendar.


VIP guests can enjoy private events and tastings in exclusive lounges, while comedy nights and culinary experiences provide unique entertainment options. With such a variety of activities, Grand Villa Casino Burnaby is the perfect destination for those seeking both gaming thrills and vibrant social experiences.


Main Entertainment Highlights

  • • Live Concerts — weekly performances by bands and artists (e.g., Groove n Tonic, Famous Players).
  • • DJ Parties — regular sets by DJ Dimitri and DJ Dlireus on weekends.
  • • Themed Nights — “Retro 80s Night” and other unique party themes.
  • • Personas Lounge — dance floor, trivia nights, sports broadcasts, and parties.
  • • Atlas Live — live music Saturdays and DJ Fridays at ATLAS Steak + Fish.
  • • Comedy Shows — regular stand-up performances (Grand Villa Comedy Night).
  • • Seasonal Events — New Year’s parties, holiday specials, and prize draws.

Bars, Restaurants, and Relaxation at Grand Villa Casino Burnaby

Grand Villa Casino Burnaby offers guests more than just gaming—it’s a destination for fine dining and relaxation. Inside the complex, you’ll find stylish bars and restaurants serving global cuisine, signature cocktails, and a welcoming atmosphere. Each venue has its own concept, from a premium steakhouse to an Asian noodle bar, while lounge areas provide the perfect setting for socializing and entertainment. The casino is also connected to the Delta Burnaby Hotel & Conference Centre, offering modern rooms and meeting spaces for business events, making it ideal for both leisure and corporate gatherings.


Beyond dining, guests can unwind in lounges, enjoy live music, and take part in themed nights. Personas Patio Restaurant + Lounge is the heart of nightlife, hosting parties, sports broadcasts, and trivia nights. ATLAS Steak + Fish delivers a luxurious dining experience with live entertainment, while CHOW Lucky Noodle Bar caters to fans of Asian flavors. Complementing these are bars with creative drinks and cozy spaces for relaxation.


Dining and Leisure Spots

  • • ATLAS Steak + Fish — premium steakhouse with live music on weekends.
  • • Personas Patio Restaurant + Lounge — lounge with dance floor, parties, and sports broadcasts.
  • • CHOW Lucky Noodle Bar — Asian-inspired dishes in a modern setting.
  • • Centro Bar — central gaming floor bar with cocktails and snacks.
  • • Alpina Bar & Gaming Lounge — stylish bar with slot machines and drinks.
  • • Villa Bistro — cozy spot for breakfast and light meals.
  • • Starbucks — coffee and desserts for a quick break.
  • • Delta Burnaby Hotel & Conference Centre — comfortable rooms and meeting spaces for events.

items.title: What payment methods are accepted?
items.answer: Cash, debit and credit cards, and bank drafts are accepted.

items.title: Can I use foreign currency?
items.answer: No, all transactions are in Canadian dollars (CAD).

items.answer: English is primary, but some staff speak other languages.
